mean_cn: n. 对讲机，内部通话装置
mean_en: a system which allows a person speaking into a microphone to be heard on a speaker by people in a different room or area
sentence: My friend uses the intercom to tell me he is at my front door.
sentence_trans: 我的朋友用内部通话装置告诉我他已经到前门了。
word_etyma: inter互相 ＋ com通话 → intercom对讲机；内部通话装置
